ourCourses_description: Discover the art of coffee with our Coffee Master, Rafael Mancini. With over 15 years of experience, Rafael has explored the most iconic coffee farms in Colombia, Brazil, Bolivia, and Peru. In the heart of Peru’s central and northern jungle, he mastered every step of the coffee-making process—from fertilization, harvesting, and grain selection to innovative drying and roasting techniques. Learn how roasting can unlock the rich aromas and flavors of coffee, and become an expert in every stage of creating the perfect cup. Join our community and share the passion for coffee with a master who blends tradition and expertise in every detail.
store_description: Find everything you need to embrace your passion for coffee
